name: Prison Tycoon Alcatraz
description: At Alcatraz you need to deliver total punishment and minimum privilege to ruthless murders and hardened criminals. Do you have what it takes?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7 Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectXÂ® 9.0c compliant 64 MB Video card and drivers (ATI 9600 / nvidea GeForce 4 / Intel x3100) or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card and drivers

reviews.review_text: Terrible game with no real guidance of what to do
Downloaded the game and it wouldn't even open up on my compute. And it says we have been playing for 9 minutes when I haven't even looked at the game because IT WON'T OPEN!!!!!!!!!! DONT buy it!
